parsing_result:
# Network/USB Setting Menus

## IMAGE TRANSFER WHILE POWER OFF
If **ON** is selected, upload of files to Frame.io will continue while the camera is off.

| Options |        |
|---------|--------|
| ON      | OFF    |

## ROOT CERTIFICATE
Copy a root certificate to the camera for use with Frame.io.

| Option                  | Description                                      |
|-------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| LOAD FROM STORAGE MEDIA | Copy the root certificate from the camera memory card. |
| DELETE                  | Delete the current root certificate.             |

> Frame.io and **FTP OPTIONAL SETTING > ROOT CERTIFICATE** use the same root certificate. Changing one changes the other.

## UPLOAD STATUS
View Frame.io upload status.

## TRANSFER QUEUE
View a list of the files awaiting upload.

## RESET TRANSFER ORDER
Remove upload marking from all files selected for upload to Frame.io.
